body:
Comment 2 by **josef.svenningsson**: 
If there is no specified order then the implementation is free to starve a process
completely, something which I think no-one would be happy with. Some kind of fairness
guarantees are crucial to have in order to make sure that all goroutines can have a
go at evaluating.

So, this isn't an issue about being able to control in what order things are
happening. My concern is that some goroutine may never get the chance to do its job
if the order among receivers is undefined.
